inputs.prompt:
Create a photoshoot-style group portrait with four characters, each based on the four provided reference inputs .
Arrange all characters in a top-down, slightly elevated overhead view, similar to a drone or high-platform angle.
Characters stand loosely together on an open, clean ground plane, evenly spaced and “tiled” across the frame, all looking upward toward the camera.
Expressions are natural and relaxed, as if posing for a professional editorial shoot.
Use bright, soft lighting that casts clean shadows on the ground.
Preserve each character’s skin tone, clothing style, and proportions from the references.
Overall aesthetic: modern, crisp, magazine-style group portrait.
